analysis.title: Symptom Analysis Results
analysis.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This analysis is for informational purposes only and should not replace professional medical advice. Please consult with a healthcare provider for proper diagnosis and treatment.

fever.rec4: Consult doctor if fever persists beyond 3 days
fever.rec5: Seek immediate care if temperature exceeds 103°F (39.4°C)

headache.rec1: Rest in a quiet, dark room
headache.rec6: Consult doctor if severe or persistent

cough.rec5: Use humidifier if air is dry
cough.rec6: See doctor if cough persists beyond 2 weeks

stomach.rec6: Seek medical attention if symptoms worsen

general.rec6: Consult healthcare provider for proper evaluation

quickActions.medicineInfoMessage: I need information about a medication
quickActions.healthTipsMessage: Can you give me general health tips?
quickActions.findDoctorMessage: I need to find a doctor near me

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.text: This AI provides general health information only. For emergencies, call 108 immediately.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make quality healthcare accessible to everyone through innovative AI technology and multilingual support.
mission.extendedDescription: Our AI-powered platform provides trusted medical information, symptom checking, and healthcare guidance in multiple Indian languages, helping millions make informed decisions about their health.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where language and location barriers don't prevent anyone from accessing essential healthcare guidance.

aiAssistant.title: AI Health Assistant
aiAssistant.description: 24/7 access to AI-powered health guidance in your preferred language

symptomChecker.title: Symptom Checker
symptomChecker.description: Understand your symptoms with our intelligent assessment tool

multilingualSupport.title: Multilingual Support
multilingualSupport.description: Available in English, Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and Bengali

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Healthcare information should be available to everyone, everywhere

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: We provide accurate, evidence-based health information

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Your health data is secure and confidential

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Leveraging AI to improve healthcare accessibility

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.description: MediGuide is committed to bridging the healthcare information gap in India. We work with medical professionals and AI experts to ensure our platform provides accurate, helpful, and culturally sensitive health guidance.
commitment.disclaimer: While we provide valuable health information, we always encourage users to consult with qualified healthcare professionals for diagnosis and treatment. MediGuide is a tool to empower, not replace, professional medical care.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: A dedicated team of healthcare professionals, AI experts, and technology enthusiasts working together to improve healthcare accessibility.

hero.title: How Can We Help You?
hero.subtitle: Find answers to common questions or get in touch with our support team

faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.description: Find quick answers to common questions

emailSupport.title: Email Support
emailSupport.description: Get help via email within 24 hours

emergency.title: Medical Emergency?
emergency.description: For immediate medical assistance, call 108 or visit your nearest emergency room. Do not use this form for emergencies.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How accurate is the AI diagnosis?
faq.a1: Our AI provides general guidance based on symptoms. Always consult a healthcare professional for accurate diagnosis.
faq.a2: Yes, all your health data is encrypted and stored securely. We follow strict privacy protocols.
faq.a3: We support 13+ Indian languages including Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Bengali, and more.
faq.a4: Basic AI consultation and symptom checking are free. Premium features may require subscription.

contactForm.title: Still Need Help?
contactForm.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours
contactForm.subject: Subject

services.title: Everything You Need for Better Health
services.description: Access comprehensive healthcare solutions designed with you in mind

aiSymptom.title: AI Symptom Analysis
aiSymptom.description: Describe your symptoms and get instant, accurate health insights powered by advanced AI

aiAssistant.title: 24/7 AI Health Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Chat with our intelligent assistant for personalized health guidance in your language

reports.title: Doctor-Ready Reports
reports.description: Get comprehensive health summaries to share with your healthcare provider

howItWorks.title: Your Journey to Better Health
howItWorks.description: Get started in minutes with our intuitive, step-by-step process

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.description: Sign up in seconds with email or Google. Your data is encrypted and secure.

step2.title: Describe Your Symptoms
step2.description: Use voice, text, or images to tell us what you're experiencing in your preferred language.

step3.title: Get AI-Powered Insights
step3.description: Receive instant, personalized health guidance based on verified medical data.

step4.title: Take Action
step4.description: Download your health summary and share it with your doctor for better care.

testimonials.title: Real People, Real Results
testimonials.description: Join thousands who trust MediGuide for their healthcare needs

priya.name: Priya Sharma
priya.text: MediGuide helped me understand my symptoms in my native language. The AI chatbot is incredibly helpful and gave me peace of mind before visiting my doctor. I felt more confident discussing my health concerns.

rajesh.name: Rajesh Kumar
rajesh.text: As someone who speaks Tamil, I appreciate having health information in my language. The symptom checker is accurate and easy to use. It's like having a medical expert available 24/7.

ananya.name: Ananya Patel
ananya.text: The 24/7 availability is a lifesaver. I can get health guidance anytime, and the doctor-ready summary feature helps me communicate better with my physician. Highly recommended!

connectDoctor.title: Connect with Expert Doctors
connectDoctor.subtitle: Find and consult with qualified healthcare professionals

search.placeholder: Search by doctor name or specialty...

rajeshKumar.name: Dr. Rajesh Kumar
rajeshKumar.about: Dr. Rajesh Kumar is a highly experienced General Physician with over 15 years of practice. He specializes in preventive care, chronic disease management, and comprehensive health assessments.

priyaSharma.name: Dr. Priya Sharma
priyaSharma.education: MBBS, MD - Cardiology, DM - Interventional Cardiology
priyaSharma.about: Dr. Priya Sharma is a renowned cardiologist specializing in interventional cardiology and heart disease prevention. She has performed over 1000 successful cardiac procedures.

amitPatel.name: Dr. Amit Patel
amitPatel.about: Dr. Amit Patel is a skilled dermatologist with expertise in cosmetic dermatology, skin cancer treatment, and advanced laser procedures.

snehaReddy.name: Dr. Sneha Reddy
snehaReddy.about: Dr. Sneha Reddy is a compassionate pediatrician dedicated to providing comprehensive healthcare for children from infancy through adolescence.

arjunSingh.name: Dr. Arjun Singh
arjunSingh.education: MBBS, MS - Orthopedics, Fellowship in Joint Replacement
arjunSingh.about: Dr. Arjun Singh is a leading orthopedic surgeon specializing in joint replacement, sports injuries, and minimally invasive orthopedic procedures.

kavitaMenon.name: Dr. Kavita Menon
kavitaMenon.about: Dr. Kavita Menon is an experienced gynecologist specializing in womens health, high-risk pregnancies, and minimally invasive gynecological procedures.

vikramJoshi.name: Dr. Vikram Joshi
vikramJoshi.about: Dr. Vikram Joshi is a compassionate psychiatrist with expertise in treating anxiety, depression, bipolar disorder, and other mental health conditions.

meeraAgarwal.name: Dr. Meera Agarwal
meeraAgarwal.about: Dr. Meera Agarwal is a skilled dentist specializing in cosmetic dentistry, oral surgery, and advanced dental implant procedures.

sureshNair.name: Dr. Suresh Nair
sureshNair.about: Dr. Suresh Nair is a highly experienced neurologist specializing in stroke management, epilepsy treatment, and neurodegenerative disorders.

anitaRoy.name: Dr. Anita Roy
anitaRoy.about: Dr. Anita Roy is a skilled ophthalmologist specializing in cataract surgery, retinal disorders, and advanced eye care treatments.

rohitGupta.name: Dr. Rohit Gupta
rohitGupta.about: Dr. Rohit Gupta is an experienced ENT specialist with expertise in sinus surgery, hearing disorders, and voice-related problems.

deepikaIyer.name: Dr. Deepika Iyer
deepikaIyer.about: Dr. Deepika Iyer is a dedicated general physician focusing on preventive healthcare, chronic disease management, and family medicine.

upload.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this lab report?

booking.success: Lab tests booked successfully! You will receive a confirmation call shortly.

analysis.title: AI Lab Report Analysis
analysis.disclaimer: Important: This AI analysis is for informational purposes only and does not constitute medical diagnosis. Please consult with a qualified healthcare professional for proper medical advice and treatment.
analysis.integrationNotice: This lab report analysis has been automatically integrated into your Doctor-Ready Report and is available for your healthcare provider to review.

cbc.name: Complete Blood Count (CBC)
cbc.description: Comprehensive blood test to check overall health and detect various disorders

lipidProfile.name: Lipid Profile
lipidProfile.description: Measures cholesterol and triglyceride levels to assess heart disease risk

hba1c.name: HbA1c (Diabetes)
hba1c.description: Measures average blood sugar levels over the past 2-3 months

lft.name: Liver Function Test (LFT)
lft.description: Evaluates liver health and function through various enzyme levels

kft.name: Kidney Function Test (KFT)
kft.description: Assesses kidney function through creatinine and urea levels

vitaminD.name: Vitamin D Test
vitaminD.description: Measures vitamin D levels in blood

urineRoutine.name: Urine Routine & Microscopy
urineRoutine.description: Basic urine analysis for infections and kidney function

header.title: Emergency Ambulance Service
header.subtitle: Immediate medical assistance when every second counts

form.title: Request Ambulance
form.subtitle: Fill in the details below to request an ambulance
form.pickupLocationHint: Be as specific as possible for faster response
form.contactNumberHint: We'll call this number for updates
form.emergencyTypeHint: Helps us prepare appropriate medical equipment

validation.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields

confirmation.title: Ambulance Request Confirmed
confirmation.subtitle: Help is on the way
confirmation.message: An ambulance has been dispatched to your location. Please keep your phone accessible. Our team will contact you shortly.

whatToExpect.title: What to Expect
whatToExpect.point3: Direct transport to nearest appropriate hospital
whatToExpect.point4: You'll receive a confirmation call shortly

beforeArrival.title: Before Ambulance Arrives
beforeArrival.point2: Do not move patient unless necessary
beforeArrival.point3: Have medical documents ready if available
beforeArrival.point4: Ensure clear access to pickup location
